resources.string: There are currently no call arounds.
Select which of the contact groups should be doing call around.
There are currently no contact groups. Add these in the phone\'s contacts settings.
A checkmark means that the location is permitted.
A checkmark means that call around is expected from the house.
Send a copy of the database to someone
Replaces the 24/7 database with one on the SD card (in the bluetooth folder).
Clear all data from the database, permanently.

If you don\'t know exactly what you\'re doing here, hit Cancel now. Otherwise, hit OK to upload a new database. The database should be called "thedatabase" and it should be on the SD card, in the "bluetooth" folder.
If you don\'t know exactly what you\'re doing here, hit Cancel now. You will lose ALL of the data. You will never get it back.
This is just to confirm that you want to delete EVERYTHING, irrecoverably. This is the last warning! Click Ok to delete everything and start from scratch.
There are no callarounds for this day.
Clear call arounds & check-ins due before one week ago
Clear logged events from before one week ago
What time the call around alarm should sound, if no one has checked in
What time daily call around is due
The earliest time a team member can do call around
The latest time a team member can do call around, if s/he requests a delay
The time each day that the day\'s call arounds should be added
Blocking number will make 24/7 ignore everything from that number.
If you block this person\'s number, s/he will be cut off from the system entirely. (This can be undone later.) Are you sure you want to do this?
Allow new users to add themselves to the system
There are currently no blocked numbers
There are no numbers associated with this house. Either add people or disable this house\'s call around.
The delay between when the phone first starts ringing and when 24/7 checks for the ringing to have stopped.
No events logged at this time
Show call arounds that are scheduled after today
Are you sure you want to delete all records of unsent and undelivered messages?
If this box is checked, 24/7 will ignore any incoming messages or calls.
Every guard will get at least this many calls.
Randomly add up to n calls. The probability of all n calls being made is 0.5^n.
Time in minutes that the guard has to respond
The place(s) that are currently off-limits are: %s
This guard has no check-ins at this time.
Send the settings from this phone to another phone.

If you don\'t know exactly what you\'re doing here, hit Cancel now. Otherwise, hit OK to copy the 24/7 database and settings from the SD card (the bluetooth folder). All of the data on this device will be removed, and this cannot be undone.
Read settings that you\'ve sent to the SD card from another phone.
The file %s could not be deleted. Make sure that this file is gone, or it will be difficult for future synchronizations.
Permit users to enable or disable call around
There was an error in sending the guard request. ()Does this house have an assigned guard?)
It is not the time for a check-in, so you shouldn\'t ask the guard for one right now.
Attention! Someone is requesting immediate help!
Attention! Someone has missed a check-in.
Attention! There is a missed call around.
Attention! There are missed call arounds.
24/7 says: I don\'t recognize this number. Please identify yourself and indicate your house with this kind of message: this is John Doe K9
24/7 says: Thank you. In the future this number will be associated with %s
24/7 says: I\'m sorry I didn\'t recognize that command. Please check your spelling and try again.
24/7 says: I\'m sorry but something\'s gone wrong on our end. Please contact the RTL for help.
24/7 says: We actually didn\'t have a record of you being out, but we\'re glad you\'re okay.
24/7 says: Thanks. We won\'t expect call around from you until you text: turn on call around
24/7 says: Thanks. We\'ll be expecting a call around from you. To disable call around, text: turn off call around
24/7 says: Thanks. We\'re showing that call around was already disabled for you. To enable call around, text: turn on call around
24/7 says: Thanks. We\'re showing that call around was already enabled for you. To disable call around, text: turn off call around
24/7 says: The place(s) that are currently off-limits are: %s
24/7 says: There are currently no travel restrictions.
24/7 says: We understand that you are going to %s and will check in by %s. If this is an error please send another request to correct it.
(In setting this checkin we have resolved an existing one.)
24/7 says: We already have a name associated with this phone number; you may just be already in the system. If you feel this is an error please contact the RTL.
24/7 says: Thank you for checking in. Don\'t forget to let us know when you leave.
24/7 says: Welcome back. Thank you for checking in.
24/7 says: Thanks, but we\'re showing that call around is currently disabled for you. To enable call around, text: turn on call around
24/7 says: Thanks for the call around. Have a good night!
24/7 says: Thanks, but it looks like someone else has already checked in. If you feel this is an error please contact the RTL.
24/7 says: Your previous call around has been canceled.
24/7 says: At the moment you are not associated with any house in our system. This should change soon. Please contact the RTL in the meantime if you need assistance.
24/7 says: This is a notification that the RTL has resolved your check-in. If you feel this is a mistake, send another check-in request or contact the RTL.
24/7 says: This is a notification that the RTL has resolved your trip. If you are not back home, please send another check-in request or contact the RTL.
24/7 says: New users are currently not being accepted. Please contact the RTL if you need help.
24/7 says: This is a reminder that you have a check-in due in about three minutes.
24/7 says: Okay, we\'ll send you a reminder three minutes before your check-in is due.
24/7 says: Okay, we won\'t send any reminders about check-in. (If you have a current check-in, you\'ll get a reminder for one last one.)
24/7 says: Thanks. That\'s actually the setting we already had for you.
24/7 says: Sorry, but it\'s either too early or too late for today\'s callaround. Contact the RTL if you have questions.
24/7 says: Your call around time has been delayed until %s. You can call around before then if you wish.
لطفاً این نمبر را مست کال کنید. Lutfan in nambar ra mist kal koned. Please missed call this number.
یا وقت برای چکین نیست، یا وقتش تیر شده. Ya wakht bare checkin nest, ya wakhtesh ter shuda. Either it is not the time for checkin, or the time has passed.
24/7 says: You are currently not allowed to go there. You can missed-call 24/7 to get a list of forbidden locations.
24/7 says: Your checkin has not been processed. Please include a valid location keyword with your location. The possibilites are: %s
24/7 says: I\'m sorry, but that is not the name of a house. The possibilities are: %s
24/7 says: Thank you. We\'ve dissociated you from all houses.
24/7 says: Thank you. We\'ve recorded that you\'ll be staying at %s.
24/7 says: We haven\'t received your call around. If everything is fine please text \"all in\".
Tried to get the guard associated with %s (%s), but got -1 as a return value.
Tried to get the number associated with guard %s (%s), but got a null return value.
